application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: The applicant is advised that the doors of the bin store should be able to open fully to allow space for the bins to be removed and placed back into the bin store and also to ensure that there is sufficient space in the binstore for the bins to be placed in a way that is accessible to users.
description: Details pursuant to Condition 6 (Flooding), Condition 7 (Tree Protection), Condition 8 (Landscaping), Condition 11 (Materials), Condition 12 (Living Walls), Condition 14 (Air Quality), Condition 15 (NRMM), Condition 16 (Low Emissions Strategy), Condition 17 (Construction Management Plan), Condition 18 (Crane Operation Plan), Condition 20 (Bird Hazard Plan), Condition 21 (Fire Safety Strategy), Condition 22 (Waste Management Strategy) and Condition 23 (Circular Economy) of planning consent ref 532/APP/2020/3198: Construction of a new research building and an infill building which includes the partial redevelopment of an existing building for research purposes together with associated substation, two bin stores, car parking, access and landscaping
